name: Travel Memory Game
description: A remake of the all-time-classic memor game. Product of a 2-day-Hackathon within the 20 week Web-Developer-Programm of Wild Code School.

name: Your Comfort Zone
description: A website to flee the bad news. Filters The Guardian news served by the NewsCatcherAPI and sprinkles in some fun elements - Nasa's daily image from space, fun fox images, A Dall-E2 integration.

name: Let's Regroup
description: A tool that helps anyone devide a larger group into equally large groups.
